analyzed: om
śrīmat prabhākara guru tantra dhurandhareṇa
mahā mahā upādhyāya śālikanāthamiśreṇa praṇītā prakaraṇa pañcikā
nyāyasiddhi ākhyayā vyākhyayā viṣama sthala ṭipparāyā
ca samalaṅkṛtā
jātinirṇayaḥ nāma
caturtham prakaraṇam
prakaraṇa artha pratijñā
bahudhā
jāti viṣaye vivadante vipaścitaḥ
prabhākara matena ayam teṣām pratyāsaḥ ucyate
kecid ācakṣate jātiḥ iti vikalpa vilāsitam iti
eke tu sattīm api jātim āśrayebhyaḥ bhinnām anumanyante
anye tu bhinnām api anumeyām āhuḥ
apare tu bhinna abhinnām icchanti

original: tathā ajātāvapi jātivyavahāro bahulamupalabhyate keṣāñciditi tannirākaraṇāyedamārabhyate /
analyzed: tathā ajātau api jāti vyavahāraḥ bahulam upalabhyate keṣāñcid iti tad nirākaraṇāya idam ārabhyate
jātiḥ āśrayataḥ bhinnā
pūrva ākāra avamarśena prabhākara guroḥ matā

original: pūrvapakṣaḥ- nanvāśraya eva dravyaṃ jāterasaditi saugatāḥ /
analyzed: pūrvapakṣaḥ nanu āśrayaḥ eva dravyam jāteḥ asat iti saugatāḥ

original: tathāhi na paramāṇuṣu caturvidheṣu pārthivāpyataijasavāyavīyeṣu jātirāśritābhimatā,
analyzed: tathā hi na paramāṇuṣu caturvidheṣu pārthiva āpya taijasa vāyavīyeṣu jātiḥ āśritā abhimatā
anuvṛtta ākāra pratyaya viyogāt
bhinneṣu yat abhinnā jātiḥ upeyate
tatra anuvṛtta ākāra avabhāsinī buddhiḥ eva nibandhanam

original: na kasyacijjantoḥ paramāṇuṣu karaṇapathavidūravartiṣu nipuṇamapi nirūpayo 'nuvṛttākārāvabhāsino matirāvirbhavati /
analyzed: na kasyacid jantoḥ paramāṇuṣu karaṇa patha vidūra vartiṣu nipuṇam api matiḥ āvirbhavati
yā api ca iyam paramāṇuḥ iti matiḥ
sā api mīmāṃsakaiḥ api saṅgīryate
pṛthivī tva ādikam api na tat tat asādhāraṇa gandha ādi guṇa samavāya mātra labdha ātma lābhāyām pṛthivī ādi buddhau nibandhanam

original: na ca sthaleṣu dravyeṣa jātiḥ samaveyāt,
analyzed: na ca sthaleṣu jātiḥ samaveyāt
teṣām eva durupagama tvāt
na khalu ghaṭate
tathā hi dvi aṇuka ādi krameṇa sthūla dravya ārambhaḥ bhidhīyate

original: tatra tāvad dravyārambha eva na sādhīyāniti manyāmahe /
analyzed: tatra tāvat dravya ārambhaḥ eva na sādhīyān iti manyāmahe
na khalu tathā eva ekaḥ paramāṇuḥ ārabhate
dravyasya ekākinaḥ sthūla dravya antara ārambhaka tva anupapatteḥ
na ca ekaika dravya vyatiriktam aparama ārambhakam asti
saṃyogaḥ pi ca tayoḥ anupapannaḥ eva
sa hi na ekaika dravya samavetaḥ
na api aneka dravya samavetaḥ
ekaika atirekeṇa anekasya abhāvāt
evam ca pratyekam eka dravya samaveta tva abhāve
na aneka dravya samaveta tvam api sambhavati

original: anenaiva mārgeṇa tryaṇukasya trimirdvyaṇukairārambhaṇīyasya mahimaguṇaśālinaḥ sambhavo nirastaḥ /
analyzed: anena eva mārgeṇa tryaṇukasya trimiḥ dvyaṇukaiḥ ārambhaṇīyasya mahima guṇa śālinaḥ sambhavaḥ nirastaḥ
tat evam dūra bhūtā sthavīyasām avayavinām ārambha saṃkathā

original: api cāvayavinaḥ kimavayaveṣu pratyekaṃ kārtsnyena vṛttiḥ ?
analyzed: api ca avayavinaḥ kim avayaveṣu pratyekam kārtsnyena vṛttiḥ
vyāsaṅgena vā
iti cintanīyam
na tāvat kārtsnyena vṛttim upalabhāmahe
ekaika avayava gatasya tasya apratipatteḥ

original: ekaikāvayavagate ca kampe rāge vā sakalasyāvayavinaḥ kamparāgapratītiprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: ekaika avayava gate ca kampe rāge vā sakalasya avayavinaḥ kampa rāga pratīti prasaṅgāt
tathā avayava antare ca kampa rāga virahe kampa rāga viraha samāsakteḥ
avayavī kampeta na kampeta

original: rajyeta na rajyeta ceti viṣamāṃ daśāmāviśet /
analyzed: rajyeta na rajyeta ca iti viṣamām daśām āviśet
nā api vyāsaṅgena avayavinaḥ vṛttiḥ avayava antara virahāt
avayava antara śālinaḥ hi kenacid avayavena kvacana
kenacid avayavena kvacana iti vyāsaṅginī vṛttiḥ upapattimatī
kiñca eka ekatra avṛtteḥ avṛttiḥ eva
kiñca sakala avayava grahaṇe eva niyamena avayavī jñāyeta
na ca tathā sambhavati
avayava antareṇa avayava antara tiraskārāt

original: na ca prakārāntareṇa vṛttiriti vadituṃ śakyam;
analyzed: na ca prakāra antareṇa vṛttiḥ iti vaditum śakyam
anupapatteḥ prakāra antarasya

original: avayavebhyaścāvayavī vyatiricyamāno 'vyatiricyamāno vā na pramāṇena saṅgacchate /
analyzed: avayavebhyaḥ ca avayavī vyatiricyamānaḥ vyatiricyamānaḥ vā na pramāṇena saṅgacchate
vyatiriktaḥ hi diś grahe grahaṇam kadācid anubhavet
na khalu bhinnayoḥ saha upalambha niyamaḥ ghaṭa paṭayoḥ iva
tadvat avayavī api bhidyamānaḥ na avayavaiḥ eva saha upalabhyeta
kasyāñcid api daśāyām ananubhūyamāneṣu api avayaveṣu anubhūyeta
na ca avayavinam avayava anubhavam antareṇa kecid upalabhante
a vyatiricyamānaḥ tu na asti eva iti vacana bhaṅgi mātreṇa uktam bhavati
tat evam avayavi dravyam upapattibhiḥ anusandhīyamānam ekāntataḥ līyate
katham tarhi sthūla avabhāsinī manīṣā samarthanīyā
ittham uttara adhara bhāvena nirantaram utpannāḥ paramāṇavaḥ eva samadhigata aindriyaka jñāna janana yogya daśā viśeṣāḥ pratyakṣam īkṣyante
tān tathābhūtān anusaṃdadhataḥ tad bala bhāvī mānasaḥ eva sthūla vikalpaḥ vijṛmbhate

original: dūrādiva taruṣu nirantareṣu samanubhūyamāneṣu vanamiti matiḥ /
analyzed: dūrāt iva taruṣu nirantareṣu samanubhūyamāneṣu vanam iti matiḥ
atas sthavīyasām dravyāṇām āśraya tvena abhimatānām ayogāt jātiḥ api tad āśritā nā abhyupagamam arhati
api ca jātiḥ api na indriya jñāna viṣayā pratīyate
tasyāḥ nitya tvena abhyupagamāt
nahi nityam kasmaicid kāryāya paryāptam
tat hi na śakta svabhāvam
nityam kārya udaya prasaṅgāt

original: aśaktasvabhāvaṃ tu nityatvādavicikitsayāśaktikaṃ nityaṃ na kiñcit kuryāt /
analyzed: aśakta svabhāvam tu nitya tvāt avicikitsayā aśaktikam nityam na kiñcid kuryāt
na ca ajanakam indira naya jñāna viṣaya tām anubhavati
yaḥ hi viṣayaḥ svasya anvaya vyatireka jñānam anukārayati
sa pratyakṣaḥ

original: kiñca samunmiṣitacakṣuṣaścirāya viṣayāntarānusandhānavyāvṛttacittasya purovartinīṃ svastimatīṃ kālākṣīṃ vā sākṣātkurvāṇasyeva na jātiraparāvabhāsate
analyzed: kiñca samunmiṣita cakṣuṣaḥ cirāya viṣaya antara anusandhāna vyāvṛtta cittasya purovartinīm svastimatīm kāla akṣīm vā sākṣātkurvāṇasya iva na jātiḥ aparā avabhāsate
anyat ca na jātiḥ asau piṇḍaiḥ saha utpadyate
vinaśyati vā
tathā upagame
ca jātiḥ aneka adhiṣṭhānā pratijñāyate
utpattimatī vināśinī ca anyā anyā syāt
viruddha dharma adhyāsasya bheda āpādaka tvāt

original: seyaṃ nityā jātiruditavatyāṃ vyaktau pratīyamānā nānyata āgatā,
analyzed: sā iyam nityā jātiḥ uditavatyām vyaktau pratīyamānā na anyatas āgatā
niṣkriya tvāt
na ca tatra eva āsīt
prāk apratīteḥ
na ca sthitiḥ api yuktimatī
vyaktiḥ eva hi tasyāḥ deśaḥ na ākāśa ādiḥ
anutpannā ca vyaktiḥ iti kva avatiṣṭhatām ākṛtiḥ
na ca utpādye pi avatiṣṭhate
tat eṣā jātiḥ avatiṣṭhate
na avatiṣṭhate ca
iti saṅkaṭam āpatitam
kiñca vyakteḥ abhinnā vā
bhinnā vā
ubhaya rūpā vā jātiḥ āstheyā
tatra na abhinnā

original: tathābhāve vyaktyā sahotpāde vināśe vā svarūpahāniprasaṅga iti purastādupanyastam /
analyzed: tathā abhāve vyaktyā saha utpāde vināśe vā svarūpa hāni prasaṅgaḥ iti purastāt upanyastam

original: vyaktimātrāṅgīkāre ca ko 'smatpakṣasya asya ca bheda ityapi cintayāntaḥ sīdantu bhavantaḥ /
analyzed: vyakti mātra aṅgīkāre ca kaḥ smad pakṣasya asya ca bhedaḥ iti api cintayāntaḥ sīdantu bhavantaḥ

original: ato vyaktimātramevava tattvamiti vadatāṃ sāhāyyakamevācaritamanatirekiṇīṃ jātimurarīkurvāṇaiḥ /

bhinna tve pi piṇḍa grahaṇam antareṇa grahaṇa āpattiḥ
ubhaya pratītau ca
asti eva iti ced
mahat idam vaiyātyam

original: kaḥ khalu iha gavi gotvamiti matimabhyupagacchet,
analyzed: kaḥ khalu iha gavi go tvam iti matim abhyupagacchet

original: bhinnatve ca vṛttiprakāro durnirūpa eva---kiṃ vyāsaṅginī vṛttiḥ ?

uta pratyeka parisamāptimatī iti

original: ekatra ca parisamāptāvanyatra na varteteti punarapi svarūpahāniprasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: ekatra ca parisamāptau anyatra na varteta iti punar api svarūpa hāni prasaṅgaḥ
vyāsaṅgaḥ pi kāla traya vartinīṣu vyaktiṣu anupapannaḥ eva

original: pratyekañca gauḥ gauriti pratyayo vikalpamātramityaṅgīkṛtaṃ syāt /
analyzed: pratyekam ca gauḥ gauḥ iti pratyayaḥ vikalpa mātram iti aṅgīkṛtam syāt

original: na copalambhabalena virodha eva nāstīti caturasram,
analyzed: na ca upalambha balena virodhaḥ eva nā asti iti caturasram
tathāvidhasya upalambhasya eva asambhāvanīya tvāt
abhinna ākāra buddhi bodhyam hi vastu abhinnam iti laukikāḥ manyante

original: tatra yadi vilakṣaṇākārapratītisamaye dve vastunī vilakṣaṇenākāreṇāvabhātastadābhedapratītidaśāyāmeka ākāro 'nubhavanīyaḥ---sa jātibhāgasya
analyzed: tatra yadi vilakṣaṇa ākāra pratīti samaye dve vastunī vilakṣaṇena ākāreṇa avabhātaḥ tadā abheda pratīti daśāyām ekaḥ ākāraḥ nubhavanīyaḥ sa jāti bhāgasya
tatra ekasya dvis avabhāsaḥ yam syāt na tu jāti jātimatoḥ abheda avabhāsaḥ
atha vilakṣaṇau api ākārau tādātmyena avasīyete iti matam
tatra api paryanuyojanīyaḥ kim idam tādātmyam nāma iti
yadi eka ākāra tā iti brūyāt
tarhi pūrva uktam eva dūṣaṇam ātmasāt kṛtam
śabdayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam tādātmyam iti ced
gauḥ vāhīkaḥ ityādau a tādātmye pi sāmānādhikaraṇya darśanāt
upacāraḥ tatra iti ced
atra api bhinna jāti vādinaḥ upacāram eva manyante

original: vayantu vivakṣāmātraparatāntrāḥ śabdā na vastuvyavasthāpanāyeśata iti sarvatra manyāmahe /
analyzed: vayantu vivakṣā mātra para tā antrāḥ śabdāḥ na vastu vyavasthāpanāya īśate iti sarvatra manyāmahe

original: kathaṃ tarhi gaurgauriti nānābhūtāsu vyaktiṣu buddhiranuvṛttamākāramullikhantī samupajāyate ?
analyzed: katham tarhi gauḥ gauḥ iti nānā bhūtāsu vyaktiṣu buddhiḥ anuvṛttam ākāram ullikhantī samupajāyate
tena asyāḥ eva buddheḥ draḍhimnaḥ kāraṇam anumāsyāmahe

original: asti tadviśeṣaṇaṃ yaduparāgavaśeneyaṃ bhinneṣvabhinnākārānusandhāyinī dhīrudīyata iti /
analyzed: asti tat viśeṣaṇam yat uparāga vaśena iyam bhinneṣu abhinna ākāra anusandhāyinī dhīḥ udīyate iti
tat api na jāti sādhana samartham

original: kāryabhūtā hi buddhireṣā kāraṇamākṣipantī yadanantaramevopajāyate tadeva kāraṇaṃ kalpayati,
analyzed: kārya bhūtā hi buddhiḥ eṣā kāraṇam ākṣipantī yat anantaram evā upajāyate tat eva kāraṇam kalpayati
na punar apratītam aparam api kiñcid upasthāpayati

original: sā ceyaṃ svalakṣaṇaviṣayadarśanasamanantarabhāvinīti tā eva vyaktayaḥ svanirbhāsā buddhīrupajanayya tanmukhena tāmekākārānubhāsinīṃ dhiyamāvirbhāvayanti
analyzed: sā ca iyam sva lakṣaṇa viṣaya darśana samanantara bhāvinī iti tāḥ eva vyaktayaḥ sva nirbhāsāḥ buddhīḥ upajanayya tad mukhena tām eka ākāra anubhāsinīm dhiyam āvirbhāvayanti

original: nitāntabhedavatīnāṃ ca vyaktīnāṃ kāsāṃcideṣa mahimā na sarvāsāmiti kimanupapannam /
analyzed: nitānta bhedavatīnām ca vyaktīnām kāsāṃcid eṣa mahimā na sarvāsām iti kim anupapannam

original: yathā hyatyantabhinnā api cakṣurālokamanassaṃyogāḥ ekasāmagrīsamupanipatitā ekavijñānodayalakṣaṇaṃ kāryamārabhante,
analyzed: yathā hi atyanta bhinnāḥ api cakṣuḥ āloka manaḥ saṃyogāḥ eka sāmagrī samupanipatitāḥ eka vijñāna udaya lakṣaṇam kāryam ārabhante

original: tathā vyaktayo 'pi kiṃ nārabhanta iti nedaṃ pratipattikaṭhinam /
analyzed: tathā vyaktayaḥ pi kim nā ārabhante iti nā idam pratipatti kaṭhinam

original: sā ceyaṃ svākāreṇābhedenātyantikabhedayoginīnāmapi vyaktīnāṃ bhedaṃ samvṛṇotīti saṃvṛtirityanugīyate /
analyzed: sā ca iyam sva ākāreṇa abhedena ātyantika bheda yoginīnām api vyaktīnām bhedam samvṛṇoti iti saṃvṛtiḥ iti anugīyate

original: eṣā ca manīṣā na svalakṣaṇaṃ viṣayīkaroti,
analyzed: eṣā ca manīṣā na sva lakṣaṇam viṣayīkaroti
tasya viśada avabhāsi tvāt
asyāḥ ca abhilāpa saṃsarga yogya artha pratibhāsa tvāt
abhilāpānām ca viśada ākāram avabhāsitum aśakteḥ
abhilāpa mātreṇa
tena eṣā na su accha ākāra avabhāsinī
nanu etat pratīti parāhatam uditam
gauḥ ayam iti buddhau viśada avabhāsāt
ucyate enad viśada avabhāsi tvam avajānīmahe
tat tu samāna kāla bhāvinaḥ nirvikalpa pratayayasya sva lakṣaṇa avalambinaḥ prasādāt
tad abhāve tathātva anupalambhāt
na ca etat vācyam katham ekam eva vastu indriyaiḥ viśada avabhāsam anubhūyate
bhidyamāne pi bodha upāye bodhya abhede bodha vailakṣaṇya anupapatteḥ
niyata ākāram ca sva lakṣaṇam aniyata ākāraḥ ca asyām buddhau cakāsti

original: tadevaṃ viśadāviśadatayā niyatāniyatatayā ca svalakṣaṇasya vikalpākārasya ca bhede
analyzed: tat evam viśada a viśada tayā niyata a niyata tayā ca sva lakṣaṇasya vikalpa ākārasya ca bhede

original: satyapi vikalpāḥ sākṣātparamparayā vā svalakṣaṇaviṣayadarśanaprabhavatayā svalakṣaṇagrahaṇābhimānino jāyante /
analyzed: sati api vikalpāḥ sākṣāt paramparayā vā sva lakṣaṇa viṣaya darśana prabhava tayā sva lakṣaṇa grahaṇa abhimāninaḥ jāyante

original: tata eva tatra pravartayantaḥ puruṣaṃ vyavahārāṅgabhāvamanubhavanti /
analyzed: tatas eva tatra pravartayantaḥ puruṣam vyavahāra aṅga bhāvam anubhavanti
pāramparyeṇa vastuni pratibandhāt avastu api pratibaddham bhavati
maṇi prabhāyām maṇi buddhi vat

original: yathā hi khalu maṇiprabhāyāṃ maṇidīptāyāṃ maṇikiraṇaviṣayiṇī maṇibuddhirayathārthatayā bhedamajuṣamāṇāpi maṇimanu pratibaddheti maṇisamadhigamanimittaṃ
analyzed: yathā hi khalu maṇi prabhāyām maṇi dīptāyām maṇi kiraṇa viṣayiṇī maṇi buddhiḥ ayathārtha tayā bhedam a juṣamāṇā api maṇim anu pratibaddhā iti maṇi samadhigama nimittam
tathā iyam api vastutas sva lakṣaṇam a gṛhṇatī api sva lakṣaṇāt darśanam

original: darśanato vikalpa iti svalakṣaṇapratibaddhā satī tatprāptaye prabhavati /
analyzed: darśanataḥ vikalpaḥ iti sva lakṣaṇa pratibaddhā satī tad prāptaye prabhavati
nirvikalpaka pratyaya samadhigata sva lakṣaṇa prāpaka tayā ca smṛtiḥ iyam ucyate
tatas eva ca gṛhīta grāhi tvāt apramāṇam

original: anyathā vastuviṣayatayā vastuprāpakatayā cānumānamiva pramāṇameva syāt /
analyzed: anyathā vastu viṣaya tayā vastu prāpaka tayā ca anumānam iva pramāṇam eva syāt

original: sa cāyaṃ tasyākāraḥ prathamāno na jñānasyaiva,
analyzed: sa ca ayam tasya ākāraḥ prathamānaḥ na jñānasya eva
bahiṣṭvena avabhāsāt
na ca artha gataḥ eva
uktena nyāyena nirasta tvāt
kintu ayam asan eva jñānam anu bhāsate śabdam iva pratiśabdaḥ
etat ca śāstra cintakāḥ vivecayanti
pratipattāraḥ tu dṛśya vikalpyau arthau ekīkṛtya bāhyam eva anunyamānāḥ vyavahāreṣu pravartante
pravṛttāḥ ca artha pratilambhena avisaṃvādam manyante
katham punar eka tva adhyavasāyaḥ dṛśya vikalpyayoḥ
a tad vyāvṛtta tayā tad sadṛśa tvāt
yathā dṛśyasya a tad vyāvṛtta tā
tathā vikalpyasya api
tasmāt jāti pratyayaḥ vikalpa mātram
paramārthataḥ tu na jātiḥ nāma kiñcid
api ca dravya samavāyinī jātiḥ abhimatā
na ca gandha ādi vyatiriktam dravyam upalabhāmahe
cakṣuḥ ādīnām pratyekam rūpa ādiṣu eva vyāpārāt iti pūrvapakṣa saṃkṣepaḥ

original: siddhāntaḥ--- atrocyate---saṃvideva hi bhagavatī viṣayasattvopagame śaraṇam /
analyzed: siddhāntaḥ atra ucyate saṃvid eva hi bhagavatī viṣaya sattva upagame śaraṇam

original: gavādiṣu ca sthūlākārāvalambinī saṃvidudīyata iti nirvivādam /
analyzed: gavā ādiṣu ca sthūla ākāra avalambinī saṃvid udīyate iti nirvivādam

original: nayavīthyāñca nirṇītaṃ pramāṇaṃ smṛtiśca naḥ pratyaya iti /
analyzed: naya vīthyām ca nirṇītam pramāṇam smṛtiḥ ca naḥ pratyayaḥ iti
nanu tat eva asat iti manyate
avayavi ādīnām ekāntataḥ nupapanna tvāt
ucyate
na dṛṣṭe kācid anupapattiḥ
nanu uktā avayavinaḥ ārambhaka abhāvāt
anupapannā iyam anupapattiḥ
kāryam pratītam kāraṇa kalpanāyām pramāṇam
na punar sphuṭa avabhāsi kāryam kāraṇa a nirūpaṇe pahnavam arhati

original: tenāvayavā eva samāsāditasaṃyogalakṣaṇasādhāraṇaguṇā avayavina utpādakā bhaviśyanti /
analyzed: tena avayavāḥ eva samāsādita saṃyoga lakṣaṇa sādhāraṇa guṇāḥ avayavinaḥ utpādakāḥ
eva an ekatra vartate
eka ekatra saṃyukta pratyaya anudayāt

original: ekātiriktānekābhāve 'pyekaiva eva sadvitīya āśrayaḥ saṃyogasyeti na doṣaḥ /
analyzed: eka atirikta aneka abhāve pi ekā eva eva sa dvitīyaḥ āśrayaḥ saṃyogasya iti na doṣaḥ

original: nanu dravyaṃ eva tathotpanne saṃyogavikalpamāvirbhāvayato na tadatirekī saṃyogo nāma kaścid guṇaviśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: nanu dravyam eva tathā utpanne saṃyoga vikalpam āvirbhāvayataḥ na tad atirekī saṃyogaḥ nāma kaścid guṇa viśeṣaḥ
tat na pratyabhijñāyete hi dravye anuvṛtte

original: kādācitkī ca tayorapareyaṃ daśā dṛśyata iti bhavatyeva bhedasiddhiḥ /
analyzed: kādācitkī ca tayoḥ aparā iyam daśā dṛśyate iti bhavati eva bheda siddhiḥ
sthāpitā ca mīmāṃsā jīva rakṣāyām pratyabhijñā
atas saṃyoga lakṣaṇa sādhāraṇa guṇa asamavāyi kāraṇa upagṛhītāḥ avayavāḥ eva samavāyi kāraṇam avayavinaḥ upapadyante
vṛtti vikalpena doṣaḥ uktaḥ
saḥ u pi avayavinaḥ pratītau sthitāyām anupapannaḥ
vyāsaktaḥ eva avayaveṣu avayavī
na ekatra jāti vat parisamāptaḥ

original: avayavāntarairapi ca vinā sa tasya ko 'pi mahimā,
analyzed: avayava antaraiḥ api ca vinā sa tasya kaḥ mahimā

original: ya eka evānekāvayavānusyūta iti kiṃ na kalpyate /
analyzed: yaḥ ekaḥ eva aneka avayava anusyūtaḥ iti kim na kalpyate
yadi api ca avayavinaḥ eka ekatra avṛttiḥ tathā api na avṛtti doṣaḥ

original: saṃyogasacivā evāvayavā janakā āśrayabhūtā yataḥ janakatayaivāśrayatvāt samavāyikāraṇānām /
analyzed: saṃyoga sacivāḥ eva avayavāḥ janakāḥ āśraya bhūtāḥ yatas janaka tayā eva āśraya tvāt samavāyi kāraṇānām

original: ata eva saṃyogaḥ sadvitīyāśraya iti na doṣaḥ /
analyzed: atas eva saṃyogaḥ sa dvitīya āśrayaḥ iti na doṣaḥ
na ca sakala avayava upalambha sāpekṣā tad upalabdhiḥ
avayavinaḥ tebhyaḥ bhinna tvāt
na ca etāvatā eka avayava grahaṇe grahaṇa paryanuyogaḥ yuktaḥ
kārya anuguṇa tvāt kāraṇa kalpanāyāḥ

original: kāryasiddhyarthaṃ hi kāraṇaṃ parikalpyate na kāryavināśāya /
analyzed: kārya siddhi artham hi kāraṇam parikalpyate na kārya vināśāya
tena yāvatām avayavānām grahaṇe tad upalambhaḥ tāvatām eva avagamaḥ tad avagama nibandhanam iti darśana balena abhyupeyate
ti tatas eva saha upalambha niyamaḥ
upeya upāya bhāvāt
upeya bhūtaḥ vayavī upāya pada vartinaḥ ca avayavāḥ

original: pratyekaṃ tu teṣāṃ śakyata evāsahopalambho 'pi vaktum,
analyzed: pratyekam tu teṣām śakyate eva asaha upalambhaḥ vaktum
avayava antara yoginaḥ parigrahe itara avayava vyatirekaḥ sudarśe eva
iyat ca bheda sādhane yuktiḥ anvaya vyatirekābhyām hi vastu antara tvam avasīyate
avagamyamānaḥ pi ca avayavī vilakṣaṇa buddhi gocara tām āvahati eva

original: avayavī hi sthavīyāneko hṛdayamāgacchati avayavāstu kṣodīyāṃso bhūyāṃsaśca /
analyzed: avayavī hi sthavīyān ekaḥ hṛdayam āgacchati avayavāḥ tu kṣodīyāṃsaḥ bhūyāṃsaḥ ca

original: sa cāyamavayavī mahattvādrūpavattvācca cākṣuṣaḥ spārśano vā,
analyzed: sa ca ayam avayavī mahā tvāt rūpavat tvāt ca cākṣuṣaḥ spārśanaḥ vā
pārthivaḥ vā ambhasaḥ vā taijasaḥ vā
vāyavīyaḥ tu mahā tvāt sparśavat tvāt ca spārśanaḥ eva
dvi aṇukaḥ tu cāturbhautikaḥ u pi amahat tvāt apratyakṣaḥ eva
tasya ca amahat tvam
mahat tva guṇa kāraṇānām abhāvāt

original: gaganādīnāṃ tu mahatāmapi rūpasparśavidhuratayā na pratyakṣagocaratetyalamativistareṇa /
analyzed: gagana ādīnām tu mahatām api rūpa sparśa vidhura tayā na pratyakṣa gocara tā iti alam ati vistareṇa
nanu sakala avayava samāśrita tvāt avayavinaḥ tirohitaiḥ avayavaiḥ katham avayavinā samāgamaḥ
na ca asaṅgatam eva bahis indriyam avabodhakam iti pratijñā yujyate
avayavānām api asannikṛṣṭa indriya bodhya tva āpatteḥ iti
ukta uttaram etata
bhinna tvāt avayavinaḥ vayava antara asaṃyoge pi saṃyoga buddheḥ paṭa ādiṣu upapannaḥ eva indriya sannikarṣaḥ vayavinaḥ
tat anayā diśā tāvat upapannam āśraya dravyam ākṛteḥ pṛthulam
nanu uktam rūpa ādi vyatireki dravyam na upalabhyate iti
kim idam paśyatohara tvam pratīyate hi mahān avayavī rūpa ādi vyatirekī
atas eva japā kusuma sannidhāna abhibhūta rūpam api sphaṭika dravyam pratyabhijñāyate
katham nāma agṛhītam pratyabhijñāyeta

original: api ca darśanasparśanābhyāmekārthagrahaṇādrūpasparśavyatireki dravyaṃ sphuṭatarapratītaṃ tat nāpanhotumucitam /
analyzed: api ca darśana sparśanābhyām eka artha grahaṇāt rūpa sparśa vyatireki dravyam sphuṭatara pratītam tat na apanhotum ucitam

original: ata eva vanādiṣu bādhakapratyayabalena tatkalpanā na prasaratīti dūratayāntarālāgrahaṇanibandhano 'yamabhedavyavahāraḥ pravartata iti /
analyzed: atas eva vana ādiṣu bādhaka pratyaya balena tad kalpanā na prasarati iti dūra tayā antarāla agrahaṇa nibandhanaḥ yama bheda vyavahāraḥ pravartate iti
avayavini tu bādhaka jñānam na asti iti purastāt āveditam
tena āśraya dravya abhāvāt jāteḥ apalāpaḥ pralāpa mātram iti sthitam

original: yaccedamuditaṃ 'nityatayā jāterātmavijñānajanane 'pi na śaktateti' tadapi 68kṣaṇabhaṅganirākaraṇaparvaṇi vistareṇa nityānāmathakriyākāritvasamarthanena  #
analyzed: yat ca idam uditam nitya tayā jāteḥ ātma vijñāna janane na śakta tā iti tat api vistareṇa
pratyuktam
mā vā sva vijñānam api jātiḥ ajījanat
tathā api kathaṅkāraṃrasau apratyakṣā
kāmam apratyakṣā

original: athavā na khalviyamājñā rājñaḥ kāraṇabhūtasyaiva pratyakṣeṇa bhavitavyamiti /
analyzed: athavā na khalu iyam ājñā rājñaḥ kāraṇa bhūtasya eva pratyakṣeṇa bhavitavyam iti

original: yastu yataḥ pratītaye sa tasya viṣaya iti sarvālaukikam /
analyzed: yaḥ tu yatas pratītaye sa tasya viṣayaḥ iti sarva alaukikam
nanu pratyakṣam api avisaṃvādī iva pramāṇam

original: asaṃvivādaśca tasmādātmalābhāt anyatastu bhavato69'tathābhūtasya vābhāve 'pi bhāvasambhavānniyamena saṃvādāyogāditi bālādabhyupeyaṃ pratyakṣasya  #
analyzed: asaṃvivādaḥ ca tasmāt ātmalābhāt anyatas tu vā abhāve pi bhāva sambhavāt niyamena saṃvāda ayogāt iti bālāt abhyupeyam pratyakṣasya
kāraṇam eva viṣayaḥ iti

original: ata eva ca pratyakṣamanumānaṃ ca dve eva pramāṇe;
analyzed: atas eva ca pratyakṣam anumānam ca dve eva pramāṇe
tayoḥ eva artha avisaṃvādaka tvāt
pratyakṣam sākṣāt arthena pratibaddham
anumānam tu artha pratibaddha liṅga janya tayā pāramparyeṇa pratibaddham
yasya tu na sākṣāt
nā api paramparayā artha pratibandhaḥ
na tasya pramāṇyam ucitam
tasya tad avisamvāda niyama abhāvāt

original: arthāvisamvādi ca pramāṇaṃ vyavajihīrṣamāṇā laukikā ādriyante iti /
analyzed: artha avisamvādi ca pramāṇam vyavajihīrṣamāṇāḥ laukikāḥ ādriyante iti
siddhyet ayam manorathaḥ yadi jñāna antara nibandhanaḥ visaṃvādaḥ prārthanīyaḥ
yad viṣayam eva ca yat jñānam

original: tenaiva tasmin viṣaye paryupasthāpite nāsti pratyayāntaranibandhanāvisaṃvādaprārthanā /
analyzed: tena eva tasmin viṣaye paryupasthāpite na asti pratyaya antara nibandhana avisaṃvāda prārthanā
arthena apratibaddham api ca jñānam sva mahima paryupasthāpita artham avisaṃvādakam eva saṃpravartate
tena utpatti mātre eva vijñānasya parā apekṣā
na
atas siddham śāstra ādīnām api artha pratibandha virahiṇām prāmāṇyam

original: etadarthameva nayavīthyāṃ“sarvaṃ jñānaṃ viṣayāvyabhicāri” iti pratipāditam /
analyzed: etad artham eva naya vīthyām sarvam jñānam viṣaya avyabhicāri iti pratipāditam

original: ato nityāyāmapi jātau bhavatyeva pratyakṣasya prāmāṇyam /
analyzed: atas nityāyām api jātau bhavati eva pratyakṣasya prāmāṇyam

original: yat punaruktam---'ekabhāvena manasā samākalayataḥ kālākṣīṃ svastimatīṃ vā nāsti jātipratītiḥ' iti /
analyzed: yat punar uktam eka bhāvena manasā samākalayataḥ kāla akṣīm svastimatīm vā na asti jāti pratītiḥ iti
tat asiddham
ākāraḥ hi sā
pratīte ca ākāre yadi param artha antara anusandhāna vikala tayā tasya anuvṛttiḥ nā avasīyate
anuvṛttā ca jātiḥ na anuvṛttiḥ

original: agrahaṇe 'pi ca dharmasya dharmiṇo grahaṇaṃ nānupapannam /
analyzed: a grahaṇe ca dharmasya dharmiṇaḥ grahaṇam na anupapannam

original: ata eva ca piṇḍāntarasamadhigame pūrvākāraparāmarśinī manīṣā pratyabhijñāsamākhyātodīyate /
analyzed: atas eva ca piṇḍa antara samadhigame pūrva ākāra parāmarśinī manīṣā pratyabhijñā samākhyātā udīyate

original: yaccoktam 'anāśrayatayā tatraiva prāganavasthitā niṣkriyatayā cānyasmādanāgacchantī svarūpahāniprasaṅgena vyaktyā sahānupajāyamānā kathaṃ sambandhamanubhavati  #
analyzed: yat ca uktam anāśraya tayā tatra eva prāk anavasthitā niṣkriya tayā ca anyasmāt anāgacchantī svarūpa hāni prasaṅgena vyaktyā saha anupajāyamānā katham sambandham anubhavati
jātiḥ iti
tat idam māyā moha jananam yathā jāta jana udvejana mātram
saṃyogaḥ hi ubhaya karma jaḥ bhavati mallayoḥ iva
anyatara karma jaḥ vā a sthāṇu śyenayoḥ iva

original: saṃyogajo vā yathā tantuturīsaṃyogādutpannasya paṭasya turīsaṃyogaḥ /
analyzed: saṃyoga jaḥ vā yathā tantu turī saṃyogāt utpannasya paṭasya turī saṃyogaḥ
sa ca karma prāc saṃnidhānam vā apekṣate
samavāyaḥ tu saṃyogāt vibhinnaḥ na karma
prāc sattām vā apekṣate
yatas eva tu piṇḍasya udayaḥ samavāyi kāraṇāt
tatas eva jāti samavāyaḥ pi tasya utpadyate
na vayam kāśyapīyāḥ iva nityam upemaḥ
vyaktau na jātiḥ anyatra yāti
na ca tatra avatiṣṭhate
na vinaśyati
kevalam tad vyakti samavāyaḥ tasyāḥ nivartate tena tasya anupalambhanam
tathā hi na yāti niṣkriya tvāt
na avatiṣṭhate vyakti mātra āśraya tvāt
tad abhāve vasthānām sambhavāt
na ca vinaśyati
piṇḍa antare pi pratyabhijñāyamāna tvāt iti
vināśaḥ nāma ātyantikaḥ vakṣyate
atas na saṅkaṭam kiñcid
yat ca piṇḍebhyaḥ jāteḥ abhinna tvam ubhaya rūpa tvañca dūṣitam
tat asmākam sāhāyakam eva ācaritam

original: ko hi nāma sacetanaḥ padārthāntarapratyabhijñāmabhedāśrayeṇa sādhayet /
analyzed: kaḥ hi nāma sa cetanaḥ padārtha antara pratyabhijñām abheda āśrayeṇa sādhayet

original: ko vā parasparavirodhinī ekasya dve rūpe pratijānīte /
analyzed: kaḥ vā paraspara virodhinī ekasya dve rūpe pratijānīte
bheda vādaḥ punar asmākam api sammataḥ eva
na ca tatra iha pratyaya āpattiḥ
pratītya hi ādhāram ādheyam ca sammbadham pratīyāt
sarvam ca rūpam rūpi grahaṇam antareṇa na pratīyate
atas samāna indriya grāhya tayā jātiḥ api vyakti pratyaya anupraveśinī iti
na iha pratyaya sambhavaḥ
karmaṇi tu anumeye bhavati eva ihapratyayaḥ
vṛtti vikalpe tu kṛtsna samāptiḥ eva aṅgīkaraṇīyā
na ca anyatra avṛtti doṣaḥ
pratyakṣa avagamāt vṛtteḥ
pratyabhijñāyāḥ sthāpita tvāt
pṛthak grahaṇam tu jāteḥ asiddham eva

original: vyaktyantare hi jātiḥ pratīyamānā prācyapiṇḍaparihāreṇa prakāśate /
analyzed: vyakti antare hi jātiḥ pratīyamānā prācya piṇḍa parihāreṇa prakāśate

original: udīcyapiṇḍaparihārastu prāktanapiṇḍasamadhigamasamaye siddha eveti parihṛtanikhilānupapatitakamupapāditaṃ gavādiṣu sādhāraṇākārānubhavasiddhaṃ  #
analyzed: udīcya piṇḍa parihāraḥ tu prāktana piṇḍa samadhigama samaye siddhaḥ eva iti parihṛta nikhila anupapatitakam upapāditam gavādiṣu sādhāraṇa ākāra anubhava siddham
upapannam ca pratyakṣa vedya tvam jāteḥ
indriya vyāpāra anuvidhānena pratīteḥ
saṃyukta samavāya lakṣaṇaḥ ca sannikarṣaḥ api na anupapannaḥ

original: gaurayamiti ca matirviśadatarārthanirbhāsinī prathata iti cet /
analyzed: gauḥ ayam iti ca matiḥ viśadatara artha nirbhāsinī prathate iti ced
tat na tathā bhāve pramāṇa abhāvāt
śabda mātreṇa tu kevala ākāra parigṛhīta ākāra pratīteḥ rūpa antara anavabhāsāt ca a viśada avabhāsaḥ eva

original: aindriyake tu samvedane pracuratarāvayavarūpāvabhāsādviśadāvagama iti nābāhyaviṣayatvāpattiḥ /
analyzed: aindriyake tu samvedane pracuratara avayava rūpa avabhāsāt viśada avagamaḥ iti na abāhya viṣaya tva āpattiḥ

original: nanveṣā jātipratītirbhinnāmeva vyaktimabhedenāvagamayantī jāyata iti bhrāntireṣā na pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇam /
analyzed: nanu eṣā jāti pratītiḥ bhinnām eva vyaktim abhedena avagamayantī jāyate iti bhrāntiḥ eṣā na pratyakṣam pramāṇam

original: iyantu bhrāntirnirbījā na yujyata iti bījabhāvena jātiranumīyate,
analyzed: iyantu bhrāntiḥ nirbījā na yujyate iti bīja bhāvena jātiḥ anumīyate
tad samavāyaḥ ca
dṛṣṭā hi santāpa sañcārita dahana paramāṇu saṃvalita ayaḥ golake dahana ākāra anukāriṇī pratītiḥ iti
tat idam ukta uttaram api punar paryanuyojyāmahe vismaraṇa aparādhāt iti manyāmahe
bhinnā hi jātiḥ avagamyate
na khalu ākāram ākāriṇam ca ekam eva manyāmahe
kevalam śabda prayoge eva samādhiḥ vaktavyaḥ

original: tatra ca laukikaḥ prayoga eva śaraṇam /
analyzed: tatra ca laukikaḥ prayogaḥ eva śaraṇam

original: prayogaśca śrutyā lakṣaṇayā gauṇyā vā vṛttyā nānupapannaḥ /
analyzed: prayogaḥ ca śrutyā lakṣaṇayā gauṇyā vā vṛttyā na anupapannaḥ
samavāyaḥ tu bhavatu vastu antare siddhe numeyaḥ
pratyakṣeṇa tad anavagamāt
ākṛtiḥ tu pratyakṣa pramāṇa siddhā na anumeyā
na ca anumānam api śakyam śākyeṣu pratibandhuṣu iti alam ati vistareṇa
sattā jāti nirākaraṇam
atra kecid gavādi tulya tayā dravya guṇa karmasu api sattā jātim aṅgīkurvanti

original: bhavati hi sarveṣveva satsaditi pratyayānuvṛttiriti saṃvadantaḥ /
analyzed: bhavati hi sarveṣu eva sat sat iti pratyaya anuvṛttiḥ iti saṃvadantaḥ
tat idam aparāmṛṣṭa jāti tattvānām upari upari
pūrvarūpa anukāriṇī yadi dhīḥ udīyate
tatas bhyupeyeta eva jātiḥ
na ca nānā jātīyeṣu dravyeṣu sarṣapa mahīdhara ādiṣu
guṇeṣu gandha rasa ādiṣu vā samāna ākāra anubhavaḥ bhavati
kavelam tu tat sat iti śabda mātram eva prayujyate
bhavati ca vinā api jātyā pācaka mīmāṃsaka ādi śabda pravṛttiḥ
nanu evam śabda pravṛttiḥ api nā eka nibandhanam antareṇa upapadyate
satyam asti eva upādhiḥ ekaḥ pramāṇa sambandha yogyatā nāma
paṇḍitammanyaḥ manyate nanu idam asamañjasam ucyate sarvatra hi upādhi bhedam avagamya aupādhika śabda anuviddhaḥ pratyayaḥ bhavati
na punar prāk eva saha vā
iha ca pramāṇam eva jāyamānam asti iti evam eva jāyate
pramāṇa udaya uttara kālam hi anayā bhavitavyam
kiñca sati api pramāṇa yoge kiñcid asti iti gamyate
kiñcid ca āsīt iti
tathā anyat bhaviṣyati iti

original: tatra pramāṇasambandhasya vartamānatvāt sarvatra vartamānasattāpratayayena bhavitavyam /
analyzed: tatra pramāṇa sambandhasya vartamāna tvāt sarvatra vartamāna sattā pratayayena bhavitavyam

original: tadatirekiṇi tu sattve tasya tredhā vyavasthānādyuktastridhāvabhāsaḥ /
analyzed: tad atirekiṇi tu sattve tasya tredhā vyavasthānāt yuktaḥ tridhā avabhāsaḥ

original: api ca bhūmitalanikhāteṣu ciratarakālavartiṣu pralīnajñātṛpuruṣeṣuliṅgādirahiteṣu sakalapramāṇapratyastamaye 'pi vartamānasattāsandehaḥ /
analyzed: api ca bhūmi tala nikhāteṣu ciratara kāla vartiṣu pralīna jñātṛ puruṣa iṣu liṅga ādi rahiteṣu sakala pramāṇa prati astamaye vartamāna sattā sandehaḥ
sa ca pramāṇa sambandha atirekiṇīm sattām antareṇa anupapannaḥ iti
tat idam an ākalita para vacanasya kevalam gala garjitam
uktam asmābhiḥ pramāṇa sambandha yogyatā upādhiḥ iti
yadi hi pramāṇa sambandhaḥ upādhiḥ iti vadema
tatas ittham upālamyemahi api

original: yogyatā tu pramāṇasambandhātiriktā pramāṇenāvasīyata iti yukta evāstīti pramāṇodayaḥ /
analyzed: yogyatā tu pramāṇa sambandha atiriktā pramāṇena avasīyate iti yuktaḥ eva asti iti pramāṇa udayaḥ
tasyāḥ ca traikālyāt traikālya avagamaḥ samarthitaḥ eva
tasyāḥ ca saṃśāyita tā api yuktā eva
kā punar iyam pramāṇa sambandha yogyatā nāma
nanu nāma antareṇa mahā sāmānyam eva idam urarīkṛtam
na etat evam
yaḥ hi mahā sāmānyam sattām saṅgirate
saḥ pi svarūpa sattām padārthānām manyate eva

original: anyathā śaśaśṛṅgādīnāmanutpannātivṛttānāñca kimiti mahāsāmānyena sambandha eva na syāditi paryanuyoge,
analyzed: anyathā śaśa śṛṅga ādīnām anutpanna ativṛttānām ca kim iti mahā sāmānyena sambandhaḥ eva na syāt iti paryanuyoge
kaḥ parihāraḥ
tena svarūpa sattā eva pramāṇa sambandha yogya tā
yasya hi svarūpam asti
tat pramāṇena paricchidyate
traikālyam api svarūpasya eva yuktam
na ca mahā sāmānyasya nitya tvāt
tathā saṃśayita tā api tasya eva
na punar asaṃśayite svarūpe paraḥ sattā sandehaḥ bhavati

original: atha nityāyā api sattāyāḥ kaḥ sambandho yaḥ sa trikālaḥ /
analyzed: atha nityāyāḥ api sattāyāḥ kaḥ sambandhaḥ yaḥ sa tri kālaḥ
tasya eva traikālyam kutas
na anyat atra uttaram svarūpa traikālyāt iti atas

original: tasmātsvarūpasattopādhika eva sacchabdo na punareka ākāraḥ sattā nāma dravyaguṇakarmaṇām /
analyzed: tasmāt svarūpa sattā upādhikaḥ eva sat śabdaḥ na punar ekaḥ ākāraḥ sattā nāma dravya guṇa karmaṇām

original: 77api ca kāśyapīyānāṃ jātisamavāyaviśeṣeṣu svarūpasattopādhika eva sacchabda ityabhyupagamaḥ /
analyzed: ca kāśyapīyānām jāti samavāya viśeṣeṣu svarūpa sattā upādhikaḥ eva sat śabdaḥ iti abhyupagamaḥ
tasya ca dravya guṇa karmasu api tathābhāvaḥ stu iti

original: tadevamapākṛte padārthasvarūpātirekiṇi mahāsāmānye sattākhye yat svamanīṣānirmitakutarkabalena sanmātraviṣayaṃ pratyakṣamiti sādhitaṃ,
analyzed: tat evam apākṛte padārtha svarūpa atirekiṇi mahāsāmānye sattā ākhye yat sva manīṣā nirmita kutarka balena sat mātra viṣayam pratyakṣam iti sādhitam
tat ati dūra utsāritam
etena eva nyāyena śabda tvam api nirastam veditavyam
nahi kakāra gakārayoḥ ekam ākāram anugatam parāmṛśantī manīṣā samunmiṣati
yaḥ pi ca ayam śabda śabdaḥ

original: so 'pi śrotragrahaṇopādhilabdhapravṛttiriti na jātu jātikalpanāyai vibhavati /
analyzed: saḥ u pi śrotra grahaṇa upādhi labdha pravṛttiḥ iti na jātu jāti kalpanāyai vibhavati
tat idam apahastitam

original: yadāhuḥ 78“śabdatvameva tattadasādhāraṇābhivyañjakadhvaninibandhanatayā nānāvarṇapeṇa viṣayībhavat tasya tasyārthasyāvagamāya kalpata” iti
analyzed: yat āhuḥ tat tat asādhāraṇa abhivyañjaka dhvani nibandhana tayā nānā varṇapeṇa viṣayībhavat tasya tasya arthasya avagamāya kalpate iti
brāhmaṇa tva ādi jāti nirākaraṇam
anayā eva ca diśā brāhmaṇa tva ādi jātiḥ api nivāritā
nahi nānā strī puruṣa vyaktiṣu puruṣa tvāt artha antara bhūtam ekam ākāram ātmasāt kurvāntī matiḥ āvirbhavati
nahi kṣatriya ādibhyaḥ vyāvartamānam sakala brāhmaṇeṣu anuvartamānam ekam ākāram aticiram anusandadhataḥ pi budhyante
yat api āhuḥ dhiyā brāhmaṇyam na avasīyate
tathā api brāhmaṇa bhūta mātā pitṛ sambandha anusandhāna prabhavāyām banddhau tat cakāsti iti
tat api ca sva mānasa visaṃvādi
anusandadhānaḥ pi mātā pitṛ sambandham kaḥ jātu ekam ākāram avaboddhum prabhavati

original: yaccopadarśitam---yathā vilīnamājyaṃ tailādavyatiricyamānaṃ gandhagrahaṇasahakāriṇā cakṣuṣaiva bhinnamavagamtaya---iti /
analyzed: yat ca upadarśitam yathā vilīnam ājyam tailāt a vyatiricyamānam gandha grahaṇa sahakāriṇā cakṣuṣā eva bhinnam avagamtayā eti
tat api na sundaram
nahi tadānīm cākṣuṣasya saṃvedanasya viṣaya atirekaḥ
kintu anumānam eva tatra sarpiṣaḥ
yaḥ tu sūkṣmam api rūpam īkṣitum kṣamaḥ
sa cakṣuṣā eva ājya jātim api pratyeti
na gandha grahaṇam apekṣate
nanu evam bahu avahīnam
kiṃnibandhanaḥ hi tadānīm āhavanīya ādi sādhya karmasu keṣāñcid adhikāraḥ na anyeṣām
kiṃnibandhanā ca brāhmaṇa śabdasya pravṛtti vyavasthā iti

original: anādau saṃsāre janyajanakabhāvena vyavasthitāstāvat kāścideva strīpuruṣasantatayaḥ santi,
analyzed: anādau saṃsāre janya janaka bhāvena vyavasthitāḥ tāvat kāścid eva strī puruṣa santatayaḥ santi
tāsām anyonya vyatikareṇa jātāḥ strīpuṃsa vyaktayaḥ brāhmaṇa śabda vācyāḥ

original: anidamprathamatayā ca santateḥ sarveṣāṃ tatsantatipatitatvāt siddhā brāhmaṇaśabdavācyatā /
analyzed: an idam prathama tayā ca santateḥ sarveṣām tad santati patita tvāt siddhā brāhmaṇa śabda vācya tā
tena santati viśeṣa prabhava tvam eva brāhmaṇa śabda pravṛttau upādhiḥ
tad prabhavānām eva karmasu adhikāraḥ iti na kiñcid avahīnam
ke punar te santati viśeṣāḥ
na te parigaṇayya nirdeṣṭum śakyante
kintu lokataḥ eva prasiddhāḥ pratyetavyāḥ

original: tathā ca tajjanyatve 'vagate brāhmaṇaśabdaṃ prayuñjate lokāḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca tad janya tve vagate brāhmaṇa śabdam prayuñjate lokāḥ
katham punar tat janya tmā iva śakyam avagantum
strīṇām aparādha sambhavāt

original: saṃbhavanti hi puṃścalyo striyaḥ pariṇetāraṃ vyabhicarantyaḥ /
analyzed: saṃbhavanti hi striyaḥ pariṇetāram vyabhicarantyaḥ
ucyate
uktam etat dṛśya adarśanam eva abhāvaḥ iti
yatra yāvatī upalabdhi sāmagrī

original: tāvatyāṃ satyāmapi yāsāṃ vyabhicāro na dṛśyate,
analyzed: tāvatyām satyām api yāsām vyabhicāraḥ na dṛśyate
tāsām na asti eva vyabhicāraḥ iti loka pramāṇakam etat

original: api ca apramattaiḥ striyo rakṣaṇīyāstāsu nāstyeva vyabhicārasambhāvanāvakāśaḥ /
analyzed: api ca apramattaiḥ striyaḥ rakṣaṇīyāḥ tāsu na asti eva vyabhicāra sambhāvanā avakāśaḥ
yāsu tu asti
mā abhūt tad apatyeṣu tad santati prabhava tva niścayaḥ

original: na caitāvatā yatrāpi niścayaḥ śakyastatrāpyaniścaya iti vaktuṃ yuktamiti /
analyzed: na ca etāvatā yatra api niścayaḥ śakyaḥ tatra api aniścayaḥ iti vaktum yuktam iti

original: yacca bahvīṣu jvālāsvekavartivartinīṣu jvālātvaṃ sāmānyaṃ pratyabhijñāgocaraḥ kaiścidipyate /
analyzed: yat ca bahvīṣu jvālāsu eka varti vartinīṣu jvālā tvam sāmānyam pratyabhijñā gocaraḥ kaiścid ipyate
tat api guruḥ asmākam na mṛṣyati

original: sa khalvevaṃ nirīkṣañcakre ananyathāsiddhā buddhiḥ sāmānyakalpanābījam /
analyzed: sa khalu evam nirīkṣañcakre ananyathā siddhā buddhiḥ sāmānya kalpanā bījam

original: iyaṃ tu bhedāgrahaṇena śuktikārajatapratyayavadupapadyata iti nālaṃ sāmānyamaupasthāpayitum /
analyzed: iyam tu bheda agrahaṇena śuktikā rajata pratyaya vat upapadyate iti na alam sāmānyam aupasthāpayitum

original: tena bhedagrahaṇapurassaramabhedajñānaṃ bhinneṣu jātyabhyupagame śaraṇamiti niravadyam /
analyzed: tena bheda grahaṇa purassaram abheda jñānam bhinneṣu jāti abhyupagame śaraṇam iti niravadyam
śālika nāthena kṛtam kṛtamatinā jāti nirṇaya ākhyam idam
bahuvidha vivāda haraṇam prakaraṇam uruṇā avadhānena

original: iti śrīmahāmahopādhyāyaśālikanāthamiśrapraṇītāyāṃ prakaraṇapañcikāyāṃ jātinirṇayo nāma caturthaṃ prakaraṇaṃ samāptam /
analyzed: iti śrī mahā mahā upādhyāya śālikanāthamiśra praṇītāyām prakaraṇa pañcikāyām jātinirṇayaḥ nāma caturtham prakaraṇam samāptam
